Rick Perry made as chairman of the Republican Governors Association, and that RGA Vice Chairman Bob McDonnell and Executive Director Phil Cox had a follow-up meeting with Mike Pence yesterday in Washington. official: `` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' It took exactly one night for Michael Vick 's name to be once again embroiled in controversy. Michael Vick 's Virginia-based lawyer Lawrence Woodward denied reports that his client spent his first night of freedom at a Virginia Beach strip club. It is absolutely, categorically false, Lawrence Woodward said. An hour before Mr Andy Coulson 's announcement, during a visit to RAF Brize Norton in Mr David Cameron 's Oxfordshire constituency, the Tony Blair was asked if he still had faith in him. He said: You know what I have said about this in the past. I have got nothing to add to that and I think he's done a very good job for the Government. Last week Mr David Cameron refused to confirm or deny reports that Mr Andy Coulson had offered to resign to spare the Government further damage. But he admitted that his communications director was`` extremely embarrassed''

`` Simon Cowell desperately wants Cheryl Cole to be a judge but if that's knocked back by Fox chiefs the next option is to start her as a mentor,'' a source tells The Sun. It would be a way to test how she's received in America. Plus viewers would be able to warm to her first, rather than having her thrust upon them by going straight on the panel. Although nothing has been confirmed yet, Simon Cowell revealed his week he'll be making an announcement about the US X Factor in`` two weeks' time''. Follow us on Twitter

Google-oprichter neemt leiding over Google-oprichter Larry Page wordt CEO van zijn eigen onderneming. De Amerikaan maakte gisteren bekend dat hij Eric Schmidt zal vervangen. Dagelijks toezicht van een volwassene niet langer nodig! , knipoogde Eric Schmidt gisteren via twitter na de publiekswissel.
